sentences.sContent: Want to be an assistant judge or notary.
sentences.sContent_eng: Want to be an assistant judge or notary.
sentences.sCn: 想成为一名助理法官或公证人。

sentences.sContent: The notary looked at the count with astonishment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The notary looked at the count with astonishment.
sentences.sCn: 那公证人惊异地望着伯爵。

sentences.sContent: "Very well; and where is this house that I purchase?" asked the count carelessly, addressing himself half to Bertuccio, half to the notary.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Very well; and where is this house that I purchase?" asked the count carelessly, addressing himself half to Bertuccio, half to the notary.
sentences.sCn: “好极了，我买的这座房子在什么地方？” 伯爵随意地问道，这句话一半是对贝尔图乔说的，一半是对公证人说的。

trans.tranOther: someone, especially a lawyer, who has the legal power to make a signed statement or document official
